name: Imperialdramon_Dragon_Mode_(Black)
description: Imperialdramon Dragon Mode (Black) is a winged, draconic, quadrupedal Digimon. It has a red mask, black armor, black skin and it has the Positron Laser on its back. The DigiCode on its Positron Laser reads デジタルモンスター ( デジタルモンスター , Dejitaru Monsutā ? , lit. "Digital Monster") .
